name: Open Windows BFCP SIP Client
short_description:
This module is a library for develop a conference solution and designed for compatibe with hardware codec equipments.
This is made on windows library.

Our module is composed with following modules.
1. BFCP : 
1. SIP : This module will be developed based on sofia library.
SIP is a signaling protocol for tele-conference and the sofia is an open source.
2. RTP : This module will be developed based on jrtp library.
RTP is a transport protocol for media data and we are developed the jrtp library is an open source.
3. Codecs : Video codec will be developed based on FFMPEG and x264.
FFMPEG is a h.264 decode module and x264 is a h264 encode module.
Both of them is also open source.
4. GUI : windows application based on MFC.
summary: Hardward Equipment Comfortable Standard Windows BFCP SIP Client
